meanings.definition: To reveal or expose something that was previously hidden or concealed.
meanings.sent1: She uncloaked her true feelings about the situation.
meanings.sent2: The magician uncloaked the hidden rabbit from the hat.
meanings.sent3: The detective uncloaked the secret identity of the mysterious character.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise uncloaked the beauty of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The storm uncloaked the hidden dangers lurking beneath the surface.
